articles.content:
Kolkata Knight Riders. (Photo Source: IPL/BCCI)
With the addition of two new franchises to the existing eight-team pool in IPL 2022, the tussle for the playoff spots is only going to get closer. Onl… [+2004 chars]

articles.author: Shiva Jayaraman
articles.title: The anatomy of Virat Kohli's century drought - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Virat Kohli's recent record of converting starts has suffered in comparison to his own lofty standards
